author: rwhitcomb
msg: PIVOT-925: Fix Expander's title bar color, which is only effective for the first
time the control is expanded/contracted after being set.
I added a field to store the color and changed the method that sets the color
during expansion/contraction to just set the label color from either the saved
color or the inactive color depending on the state.

author: mduerig
msg: OAK-1121: Enhance observation mechanism to only listen to cluster local changes
Initial implementation using a marker interface to indicate exclusion of cluster external events

author: alg
msg: i123564 corrected some aspects when working whith bitmaps with low color depth or small size

msg: PIVOT-924: Provide a standard mechanism in BXMLSerializer to report exceptions
